title: Drawing, "Greater Part of Horseshoe Falls, Seen from the Candian Side of the Niagara River", possibly 1858
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown wove paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped at upper left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped at center: Lugt 457d, noir
inscribed: Numbered in graphite, at lower right: 1-
description: Horizontal view showing the greater part of Horseshoe Falls from the Canadian bank of the river.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Greater Part of Horseshoe Falls, Seen from the Candian Side of the Niagara River", possibly 1858.Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-142-b.
